content.description: The members of Devlin’s new soccer team wear ribbons in their hair on game days that match their team’s colors. After witnessing this behavior for the first two games, Devlin arrives at the third game with ribbons in her hair that match the team’s colors.
content.question: Which of the following has occurred to influence Devlin’s behavior?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
